commit message:
Merge branch 'master' into smack4

Conflicts:
src/org/kontalk/client/NumberValidator.java
src/org/kontalk/service/XMPPConnectionHelper.java
src/org/kontalk/util/CPIMMessage.java

Signed-off-by: Daniele Ricci <daniele.athome@gmail.com>

Update asmack to 4.0.0

Signed-off-by: Daniele Ricci <daniele.athome@gmail.com>

Bump to version 33 (3.0a7)

Signed-off-by: Daniele Ricci <daniele.athome@gmail.com>

Add idle timeout choice 'Never' to disable idle disconnection (fix #169)

Signed-off-by: Daniele Ricci <daniele.athome@gmail.com>

Fix #171: workaround NPE on Google Play missing

Signed-off-by: Daniele Ricci <daniele.athome@gmail.com>

Fix stuck progress dialog during IAB setup

Signed-off-by: Daniele Ricci <daniele.athome@gmail.com>

Fix #170: consistent menus across API levels

Signed-off-by: Daniele Ricci <daniele.athome@gmail.com>

Use a single SharedPreferences instance (closes #152)

Signed-off-by: Daniele Ricci <daniele.athome@gmail.com>

Fix PayPal string

Signed-off-by: Daniele Ricci <daniele.athome@gmail.com>

Changed settings icon

Signed-off-by: Andrea Cappelli <a.cappelli87@gmail.com>

Use custom SSL context for certificate trust also when key is not available

Signed-off-by: Daniele Ricci <daniele.athome@gmail.com>

Fix #172: handle restart after service crash (start again)

Signed-off-by: Daniele Ricci <daniele.athome@gmail.com>

Confirmation dialog for block/unblock (closes #173)

Toast notification for successful user unblock

Signed-off-by: Daniele Ricci <daniele.athome@gmail.com>

Handle authentication errors (closes #98)

Signed-off-by: Daniele Ricci <daniele.athome@gmail.com>

Disable offline mode before upgrading to XMPP (fixes #174)

Signed-off-by: Daniele Ricci <daniele.athome@gmail.com>

Show presence status in a different style while updating (closes #145)

Signed-off-by: Daniele Ricci <daniele.athome@gmail.com>

Hide block/unblock menus if chatting to ourselves (fixes #176)

Signed-off-by: Daniele Ricci <daniele.athome@gmail.com>

Switching to new GCM client API (#95, missing exponential back-off)

Adding new dependency: Google Play Services library

Signed-off-by: Daniele Ricci <daniele.athome@gmail.com>

Typo

Signed-off-by: Daniele Ricci <daniele.athome@gmail.com>

Begin using Proguard from 3.0a7

Google Play Services is taking too much space. The proguard
configuration file is not very well tested yet, but it seems to work.

Signed-off-by: Daniele Ricci <daniele.athome@gmail.com>

Back-off implementation adopted from old gcm.jar (UNTESTED, closes #95)

Signed-off-by: Daniele Ricci <daniele.athome@gmail.com>

No need to keep an instance to Random (it was single use)

Signed-off-by: Daniele Ricci <daniele.athome@gmail.com>

Use ACTION_OPEN_DOCUMENT on API level >= 19 (fixes #99)

Signed-off-by: Daniele Ricci <daniele.athome@gmail.com>

Close #177: Notified vs. read messages

Signed-off-by: Daniele Ricci <daniele.athome@gmail.com>

Load avatars asynchronously (closes #160)

Signed-off-by: Daniele Ricci <daniele.athome@gmail.com>

External invitation: do not include Kontalk in intent chooser (fix #139)

Signed-off-by: Daniele Ricci <daniele.athome@gmail.com>

Use correct namespace for special menu attributes

Signed-off-by: Daniele Ricci <daniele.athome@gmail.com>

Refactor MessageCenterService (closes #166)

Signed-off-by: Daniele Ricci <daniele.athome@gmail.com>

Possibly fix #139 (but still not quite there...)

Signed-off-by: Daniele Ricci <daniele.athome@gmail.com>

Cleanup

Signed-off-by: Daniele Ricci <daniele.athome@gmail.com>

Preference to enable enter key on virtual keyboard (closes #89)

Signed-off-by: Daniele Ricci <daniele.athome@gmail.com>

Naming standards

Signed-off-by: Daniele Ricci <daniele.athome@gmail.com>

Temporary workaround for wrong resume procedure (#19)

The real fix still has to be done: check for onFocusChanged and onResume
on the activity to resume the content changed listener.

Signed-off-by: Daniele Ricci <daniele.athome@gmail.com>

Bridge certificate: set end date to start date if PGP key doesn't expire

This will of course need to be checked server-side because it's not a
standard way of using expiration information.

Signed-off-by: Daniele Ricci <daniele.athome@gmail.com>

Export keys in PEM/armored and as PKCS#12 pack (closes #93)

Signed-off-by: Daniele Ricci <daniele.athome@gmail.com>

Fix mark as read being called when resuming from lock screen (fixes #19)

Signed-off-by: Daniele Ricci <daniele.athome@gmail.com>

Convert all tabs to 4 spaces and remove CRLF line terminators

Signed-off-by: Daniele Ricci <daniele.athome@gmail.com>
